long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your text into QR codes in a snap with Just Convert QR! This user-friendly extension is perfect for anyone looking to generate QR codes effortlessly. Whether it's a URL, contact details, or any other text, you can convert it into a scannable QR code instantly.

Why Install "Just Convert QR"?
Simple & Fast: Easily transform any text into a QR code in seconds.
Customizable Colors: Make your QR codes unique by changing their colors to match your style or branding.
Versatile Usage: Use it for sharing links, Wi-Fi credentials, event details, or even fun messages!
With "Just Convert QR," you don’t just create QR codes—you personalize them to stand out.
